data.name: Cards and Castles 2
data.detailed_description:
Cards and Castles 2 is the sequel to the hit tactical CCG Cards and Castles!

Build a deck using two of seven epic factions - Druids, Vikings, Pirates, Crusaders, Warlocks, Ninjas, or the new Undead - then head into battle. Join a lobby with multiple games being played, spectate your friends, and chat; or, hop into our all-new, fully voice acted single player campaign!

There are NO microtransactions or card packs - earn shards to collect every card just from logging in and playing in ANY game mode.

Experience complex yet intuitive combat with alternating turns every round, over 10 unique unit classes, and tons of powerful spells!
data.about_the_game:
Cards and Castles 2 is the sequel to the hit tactical CCG Cards and Castles!

Build a deck using two of seven epic factions - Druids, Vikings, Pirates, Crusaders, Warlocks, Ninjas, or the new Undead - then head into battle. Join a lobby with multiple games being played, spectate your friends, and chat; or, hop into our all-new, fully voice acted single player campaign!

There are NO microtransactions or card packs - earn shards to collect every card just from logging in and playing in ANY game mode.

Experience complex yet intuitive combat with alternating turns every round, over 10 unique unit classes, and tons of powerful spells!
data.short_description: An intuitive tactical CCG with extraordinary depth. Play through the epic story in a fully voice acted single player campaign, or build your own unique decks to take into multiplayer lobbies with your friends! Play as hardy Vikings, stealthy Ninjas, swashbuckling Pirates, and more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8600 GT or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS® 10.14
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8600M GT or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
